amendment.description: To amend title 17, United States Code, to replace copyright arbitration royalty panels with Copyright Royalty Judges, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3975 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3975 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S10504) To amend title 17, United States Code, to replace copyright arbitration royalty panels with Copyright Royalty Judges, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3975 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Hatch.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3975 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
